segments.text: I see the woman so engrossed in her task, lifting her towel and inspecting a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs freely, yet she doesn’t seem to register the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s daring climb sends a jolt of anger through me; does he think he’s invincible?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His concentration is so intense, but it’s misplaced; he’s on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch as his fingers graze the cookie jar, a greedy smile spreading across his face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks thrilled, her palm outstretched, but I can’t see how she’s not afraid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she sense the danger lurking behind that cookie jar?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden remains untouched by this indoor chaos, a reminder of calmness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel conflicted; the allure of cookies shouldn’t come at such a high price.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a bittersweet scene; I can’t help but smile at their innocence even as I worry.
segments.speaker: PAR
